description:
Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toru ka Torareuka!? Okay Tera no Kettou
Will We Take It or Will It Be Taken from Us!? The Okay Temple`s Battle
จะจัดได้หรือถูกจับ ดวลที่วัดโอเคะ
獲るか獲られるか!? オッケー寺の決斗
